name: test_rsyslog_invalid_server_ca
description:
Arrange: a working Wazuh deployment with a CA not matching the client CA
    Act: send a syslog message over tls
    Assert: the client raises an error
descriptionHtml:
Arrange: a working Wazuh deployment with a CA not matching the client CA
Act: send a syslog message over tls
Assert: the client raises an error
